table.name: vtiger_docsettings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_docsettings` ( `docsettingsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `docsettingsname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `causale` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `nometemp` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `paginedaa` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `righedaa` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tipo` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `autoattach` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `docsettingsnumber` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `linktomapmaster` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `linktomapdetail` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `linktodocuments` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`docsettingsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_docsettingscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_docsettingscf` ( `docsettingsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`docsettingsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
